overview: As Senior Vice President of Client Services, Tom Weeks is responsible for Skireâ€™s service delivery and customer satisfaction. Weeks brings more than 20 years of diverse leadership experience at both small and large companies in the software and consulting industries. Prior to joining Skire, Weeks worked at SAP where he led the professional services division of Business Objects as Group Vice President, WW Geographies. Weeks has broad product experience across Business Intelligence, Project Management, ERP, CRM, Collaboration and eProcurement, with knowledge across a variety of industries. Weeksâ€™ prior experience includes executive and professional services management roles at Kovair Software, Cambridge Technology Partners and Anderson Consulting (now Accenture).
